text:
The white tower of the [[Esoteric Order of Aureon]] is surrounded by a host
of lesser magic businesses. The shops of the Mystic Market deal in
[[magic item]]s, whether locally produced or bought from explorers. Businesses in the market include:

* The ''Mithral Blade,'' a smithy that produces steel and [[mithral]] weapons and armor with magical enhancement
* ''Wise Wood'', a shop that buys and sells [[wands and staves|magical implement]]
* The ''Moonlit Loom'', which sells magic clothing
* The ''Dragon's Hoard'', which sells a wide assortment of minor wondrous items and does a brisk business in [[feather token]]s (not to be confused with the [[Dragon's Hoard]] in [[Skyway]])
* ''Boldrei's Tears'' and ''Good Spirits'', which sell potions.
title: Mystic Market
